name: Deminded
description:
Deminded is a game we made with the topic of dementia.

We have a Mac and Windows build.
There might still be bugs, feel free to send them to me. We might keep working on the game. But with the current time we have left this is what we put up.


Made By

Malebo Botden - Design, 2D Art

Tatum van Trier - Design, 2D Art

Franka Ordeman - 3D Art, Environment

Swan Chase - Development

Rowin van der Schee - Design, Sound

Mikey Woudstra - Development, Implementing, Lighting and visuals
